T07dhrmsk_u:1: (DhskD 3r1) saṃmohaḥ pramoho mohaṃ mohajam iyam ucyate avidyā /
T07dhrmsk_u:4: avidyā bhikṣavo hetuḥ saṃrāgāya hetuḥ saṃdveṣāya hetuḥ saṃmohāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:5: iti (DhskD 3r2) yā sā saṃrāgatā saṃmohatā iyam ucyate avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:7: avidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṃgamaṃ pūrvanimittam anekavidhānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ (DhskD 3r3)
T07dhrmsk_u:8: dharmāṇāṃ samutpattaye 'nūtpātiko bhavati yad uta āḥrīkyaṃ cānapatrāpyaṃ ca /
T07dhrmsk_u:9: ahrīmān bhikṣavo bhikṣur anapatrāpī mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:10: tatra bhikṣavo mithyā mithyādṛṣṭyā mithyāsaṃkalpo bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:19: iti yā sā mithyādṛṣṭir mithyāsaṃkalpo mithyāvāṅ mithyākarmānto mithyājīvo mithyāvyāyāmo mithyāsmṛtiḥ mithyāsamādhir ima ucyante avidyāpratyayāḥ (DhskD 3r6) saṃskārāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:21: ye ke cid bhikṣavo 'nekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti sarve te avidyāmūlakā avidyāsamudayā avidyājātīyā avidyāprabhavā /
T07dhrmsk_u:22: (DhskD 3r7) avidāgato hi bhikṣavaḥ ajānan kuśalākuśalān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti
T07dhrmsk_u:25: sa evaṃ kuśalākuśalān dharmān yathābhūtam aprajānan sāvadyānavadyān sevitavyāsevitavyān hīnapraṇītakṛṣṇaśuklasapratibhāgapratītyasamutpannān (DhskD 3r9)
T07dhrmsk_u:27: tatra bhikṣavo mithyādṛṣṭyā mithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati vistareṇa yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:29: (DhskD 3v1) api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā kuṃbhopame vyākaraṇe /
T07dhrmsk_u:31: apuṇyān apy āniṃjyān api saṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti /
T07dhrmsk_u:34: vākkarma kuśalāś cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ kuśalāś cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:35: yad api tat kuśalasya kāyakarmavākkarmaṇaḥ kuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ dīrgharātraṃ iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ (DhskD 3v3)
T07dhrmsk_u:36: manāpaṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate tad idam ucyate puṇyam iti vā puṇyaphalam iti vā puṇyaphalavipākam iti vā /
T07dhrmsk_u:38: āhākuśalaṃ kāyakarmavākkarma akuśalāś cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ akuśalāś cittaviprayuktāḥ (DhskD 3v4) saṃskārā /
T07dhrmsk_u:39: yad api tad akuśalasya kāyakarmavākkarmaṇaḥ akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām
T07dhrmsk_u:40: akuśalānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ dīrgharātram aniṣṭam akāntam apriyam amanāpaṃ
T07dhrmsk_u:42: ucyate apuṇyam iti vā apuṇyaphalam iti vā apuṇyaphalavipākam iti vā /
T07dhrmsk_u:50: yathā khalv ihaikatyo rāgaparyavasthito dveṣapāryavasthito mohaparyavasthitaḥ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścaritaṃ carati /
T07dhrmsk_u:54: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān narakeṣūpapadyante /
T07dhrmsk_u:60: yathā khalv ihaikatyo manuṣyasukhakeṣv avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittas /
T07dhrmsk_u:64: sa taṃ prārthayamānas taddhetukaṃ saṃvartanīyaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ carati vācā manasā sucaritaṃ carati /
T07dhrmsk_u:65: iti ye te kuśalāḥ kāyasaṃskārā vā vāksaṃskārā vā manaḥsaṃskārā vā ima ucyante puṇyāḥ (DhskD 3v10) saṃskārāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:66: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān manuṣyasukhakānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:71: api tv avidyāyāṃ satyām avidyāsaṃcetanāhetoḥ kāyena sucaritaṃ carati vācā manasā sucaritaṃ carati /
T07dhrmsk_u:72: iti ye te kuśalāḥ kāyasaṃskārā vistareṇa yāvan manuṣyasukhakānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:75: yathā manuṣyasukhakānām evaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:76: (DhskD 4r3) yathā khalv ihaiko brahmakāyikānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:78: aho batāhaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:79: sa taṃ prārthayamānaḥ taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ (DhskD 4r4)
T07dhrmsk_u:80: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T07dhrmsk_u:81: tathā samāpannasya yat kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvaraḥ ājīvapariśuddhiḥ ima ucyante puṇyāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:83: kāyasya bhedād braḥmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:87: api (DhskD 4r6) tv avidyāyāṃ satyām avidyāsaṃcetanāhetor viviktaṃ kāmair yāvat prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T07dhrmsk_u:93: yathā brahmakāyikānām evaṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ mahābraḥmāṇāṃ parīttābhānāṃ apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānām anabhrakāṇāṃ (DhskD 4r8)
T07dhrmsk_u:96: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ asaṃjñisatvānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:100: sa taṃ prārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ saṃjñām audārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikato manasikaroti āsaṃjñikaṃ ca śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:102: duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikato manasikurvataḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ ca śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataḥ saṃjñā antarāyaty āsaṃjñikaṃ ca saṃsthihati /
T07dhrmsk_u:103: yatrāsya saṃjñā antarāyaty āsaṃjñikaṃ saṃsthihaty etāvad (DhskD 4v1)
T07dhrmsk_u:105: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvaraḥ ājīvaviśuddhir ima ucyante puṇyāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:106: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād asaṃjñisattvānāṃ sabhāgatāyām (DhskD 4v2)
T07dhrmsk_u:110: 'pi tv avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ avidyābhisaṃcetanāhetoḥ saṃjñām audārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikato (DhskD 4v3)
T07dhrmsk_u:111: manasikurute āsaṃjñikaṃ ca śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:112: tasya vistareṇa yāvad āsaṃjñikaṃ saṃsthihaty etāvat asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ samāpanna iti vaktavyaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:122: aho batāhaṃ ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:123: sa taṃ prārthayamānaḥ taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjnānām atikramāt (DhskD 4v6)
T07dhrmsk_u:124: pratighasaṃjñānāṃ astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T07dhrmsk_u:125: tathā samāpannasya yā cetanā cetitaṃ cetanāmitaṃ cetayitatvaṃ (DhskD 4v7)
T07dhrmsk_u:126: cetanāgataṃ cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma ima ucyante āniṃjyāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:127: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate tatra ca saṃskārān (DhskD 4v8)
T07dhrmsk_u:131: api tv avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ avidyābhisaṃcetanāhetoḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād (DhskD 4v9)
T07dhrmsk_u:133: tathā samāpannasya yā cetanā vistareṇa ima ucyante āniṃjyāḥ saṃskārā /
T07dhrmsk_u:134: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ (DhskD 4v10)
T07dhrmsk_u:140: iti ye te saṃskārā avidyām āgamyāvidyāṃ niśrityāvidyāṃ pratiṣṭhāya utpadyanti samutpadyante jāyanti saṃjāyanti samudāgacchanti (DhskD 5r2)
T07dhrmsk_u:147: lobhaḥ alobhaḥ atha cakṣuḥ saṃskṛtaṃ kumbhopamena /
T07dhrmsk_u:152: yatha tāval lobhasahajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya lobhasahajasya vijñānasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati
T07dhrmsk_u:153: prādurbhāvaś ca dveṣasahajāṃ mohasahajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya mohasahajasya vijñānasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati (DhskD 5r4)
T07dhrmsk_u:156: api khalu cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:157: tatra cakṣuḥsaṃskṛtaṃ rūpāṇi ca bāhyaṃ pratyayaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya tad ucyate saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijnānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:159: tatra manaḥsaṃskṛtaṃ dharmāś ca bāhyaṃ pratyayaṃ manovijñānasya tad ucyate saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:160: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā kumbhopamesmin (DhskD 5r6) vyākaraṇe /
T07dhrmsk_u:161: tasya puṇyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtya puṇyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:162: apuṇyān āniṃjyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtyāniṃjyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:166: dveṣaparyavasthito mohaparyavasthitaḥ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścaritaṃ carati /
T07dhrmsk_u:167: iti ye te akuśalāḥ kāyasaṃskārā vāksaṃskārā manaḥsaṃskārā ima ucyante 'puṇyāḥ (DhskD 5r8) saṃskārāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:168: yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān narakeṣūpapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:170: evam apuṇyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtyāpuṇyopagaṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:172: kathaṃ puṇyān abhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtya puṇyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:174: yathā khalv ihaikatyo manuṣyasukhakeṣv avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:177: evaṃ (DhskD 5r10) puṇyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtya puṇyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:178: yathā manuṣyasukhakānām evaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ tatra ca vijñānam abhinirvartayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:181: katham āniṃjyān saṃskārān abhisaṃskṛtyāniṃjyopagaṃ bhavati vijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:183: yathā khalv ihaikatya ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacitto (DhskD 5v2)
T07dhrmsk_u:185: evaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānām iti yāvad vijñānaṃ saṃskārān āgamya vistaraḥ //
T07dhrmsk_u:193: yathā tāval lobhasahajaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya lobhasahajasya kāyakarmavākkarmaṇo 'bhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaś ca lobhasahajā (DhskD 5v4)
T07dhrmsk_u:195: ya idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam idaṃ nāmasya vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpasya /
T07dhrmsk_u:198: mohasahajaṃ viparyayeṇa śuklapakṣeṣv alobhasahajam amohasahajaṃ vaktavyaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:199: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā nādikāvavādavyākaraṇe /
T07dhrmsk_u:202: ity etac chokasahajaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya śokasahajasya kāyavākkarmaṇo 'bhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:205: idaṃ nāmasya vijñānaṃ vijñānasya pratyayaṃ nāmarūpasya /
T07dhrmsk_u:207: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā phalgunāvavāde vyākaraṇe /
T07dhrmsk_u:209: phalguna āhāraṃ yāvad evāyatyāṃ punarbhavasyābhinirvṛttaye prādurbhāvāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:212: yat tad gandharvasya caramaṃ cittaṃ manovijñānaṃ ācitam upacitaṃ pratiṣṭhitam aprahatam aparijñātaṃ (DhskD 5v9)
T07dhrmsk_u:214: yasya vijñānasya samanantaraṃ mātuḥ kukṣau kalalātmabhāvo 'bhisaṃmūrcchati /
T07dhrmsk_u:216: idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārās tajjaṃ (DhskD 5v10)
T07dhrmsk_u:219: asti khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā svātiṃ bhikṣuṃ kaivartapūrviṇam ārabhya /
T07dhrmsk_u:223: iha bhikṣavo mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ sannipatitau mātā ca kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito (DhskD 6r2) bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:224: imeṣāṃ bhikṣavas trayāṇāṃ sannipātān mātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntir bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:225: iti yat tad garbhasya caramaṃ cittaṃ manovijñānaṃ vistareṇa yāvad vijñānapratyayayaṃ (DhskD 6r3)
T07dhrmsk_u:228: asti khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā mahānidānaparyāye vyākaraṇe āyuṣmate ānandāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:236: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda mātuḥ kukṣau nāvakramiṣyad api nu nāmarūpaṃ kalalatvaṃ hi saṃmurcchiṣyat* /
T07dhrmsk_u:238: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda mātuḥ kukṣau nāvakramitvā punar na vyutkramiṣyat* (DhskD 6r6)
T07dhrmsk_u:239: api nu nāmarūpaṃ imaṃ dhātum āgamiṣyan /
T07dhrmsk_u:241: vijñānaṃ ced ānandādāv eva daḥram asya taruṇasya kumārakasya ucchidyeta vinaśyeta na bhaveta api nu nāmarūpaṃ virūḍhiṃ (DhskD 6r7)
T07dhrmsk_u:244: sarvaśo vā punaḥ sarvaśa ānanda vijñāne asati na nāmarūpaṃ prajñāyeta /
T07dhrmsk_u:246: tasmād dhi ānanda etan nidānam eṣa hetuḥ eṣa pratyayo nāmarūpasya (DhskD 6r8)
T07dhrmsk_u:249: iti mayā yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktaṃ //
T07dhrmsk_u:252: dvayapratyayāt* vijñānaṃ phalgunaḥ svātir eva ca
T07dhrmsk_u:257: tatra yac cakṣur yāni ca rūpāṇi idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:263: (DhskD 6v1) tatra ye rūpiṇo manovijñeyā dharmā idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ tajjaṃ vijñānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:264: idaṃ nāmarūpasya tajjaṃ manasikāraṃ nāmapratyayasya manovijñānasya /
T07dhrmsk_u:266: api (DhskD 6v2) khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā phalgunāvavāde vyākaraṇe /
T07dhrmsk_u:267: vijñānaṃ phalgunāhāraṃ yāvad evāyatyāṃ punarbhavasyābhinirvṛttaye prādurbhāvāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:270: yat tad gandharvasya caramaṃ cittaṃ vistareṇa yāvad (DhskD 6v3)
T07dhrmsk_u:271: yasya gandharvasya samanantaraṃ mātuḥ kukṣau kalalam ātmabhāvaṃ saṃmūrcchati /
T07dhrmsk_u:273: idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārās tajjaṃ vijñānaṃ idaṃ nāmasya /
T07dhrmsk_u:275: nāmarūpaṃ pratītya mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvas /
T07dhrmsk_u:277: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā svātiṃ bhikṣuṃ kaivartapūrviṇam ārabhya /
T07dhrmsk_u:281: ity evam ayoniśomanasikāreṇa sahajaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pratītya mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānasyāvakrāntir bhavati prādurbhāvas /
T07dhrmsk_u:283: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā mahānidānaparyāye /
T07dhrmsk_u:285: vijñānaṃ ced ānanda nāmarūpapratiṣṭhāṃ na labheta tathāpratiṣṭhite vijñāne anatirūḍhe + + + + + (DhskD 6v7)
T07dhrmsk_u:288: sarvaśo vā punar ānanda nāmarūpe asati api nu vijñānaṃ prajñāyeta /
T07dhrmsk_u:294: śītam uṣṇaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca pānam udvartanaṃ tathā
T07dhrmsk_u:295: śītodikā puṣkariṇī svātir eva ca rāgajaṃ
T07dhrmsk_u:299: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ śītapracurād uṣṇaṃ gacchati /
T07dhrmsk_u:302: mahābhūtāni idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ idaṃ nāmasya /
T07dhrmsk_u:303: ity etac chītasahajaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pratītya cakṣurindriyasyopacayo bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:304: (DhskD 7r1) evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi tatra upacīyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:307: yathā khalv ihaikatyo jighatsādaurbalyaparītaḥ śuci prāṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyam khādayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:309: tatra yac ca bhojanaṃ yāni ca bhojanasahajāni mahābhūtāni idaṃ rūpasya tajjā vedanā /
T07dhrmsk_u:311: yathā khalv ihaikatyas tṛṣitaḥ klāntaḥ pipāsitaḥ (DhskD 7r3)

T07dhrmsk_u:660: apratikūle sati bhūyo bhūyo vijñāne utpadyate rāgaḥ saṃrāgaḥ ālayo niyantir adhyavasānam* (DhskD 11r5) tṛṣṇā /
T07dhrmsk_u:662: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā mahānidānaparyāye āyuṣmaty ānande /
T07dhrmsk_u:663: tatrānanda yā ca bhavatṛṣṇā yā ca vibhavatṛṣṇā itīme dve tṛṣṇādvayena vedanāsamavasaraṇe (DhskD 11r6) bhavataḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:668: dṛṣṭir vicikitsā upādānaṃ vibhāgo nandam eva ca //
T07dhrmsk_u:673: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ kāmeṣv avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ utpādayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:674: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyaṃ paryavasthānam utpādayati (DhskD 11r8)
T07dhrmsk_u:675: adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ tīvrāt tīvrataraṃ pūrṇāt pūritataraṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:676: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimam upādānaṃ tad ucyante tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ upādānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:677: yathā khalv ihaikatyo rūpeṣv ārūpyeṣv avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacitta (DhskD 11r9)
T07dhrmsk_u:679: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ yāvat paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:680: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimam upādānam* /
T07dhrmsk_u:682: asti khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā pātaleyavyākaraṇe /
T07dhrmsk_u:683: deśitā vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmāḥ skandhānāṃ pravicayāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:684: yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakpradhānāni (DhskD 11v1)
T07dhrmsk_u:685: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ paṃcendriyāṇi paṃca balāni sapta bodhyaṃgāny āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga /
T07dhrmsk_u:686: evaṃ deśiteṣu vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmeṣu skandhānāṃ pravicayāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:687: atha ca punar ihaikatyā mohapuruṣā na tīvracchandā viharanti na tīvrasnehā na tīvrapremāṇo (DhskD 11v2)
T07dhrmsk_u:689: te dhandham evānuttaryaṃ spṛśanti yad utāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:690: evaṃ deśiteṣu vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmeṣu skandhānāṃ pravicayāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:691: atha ca punar ihaikatyāḥ kulaputrāḥ atīvatīvracchandā viharanti atīvatīvrasnehā (DhskD 11v3)
T07dhrmsk_u:693: te kṣipram evānuttaryaṃ spṛśanti yad utāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:694: evaṃ deśiteṣu vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmeṣu skandhānāṃ pravicayāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:695: atha ca punar ihaikatyo rūpam ātmataḥ (DhskD 11v4)
T07dhrmsk_u:698: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ kinnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhavāḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:703: tṛṣṇā bhikṣavo vedanānidānā vedanāsamudayā vedanājātīyā vedanāprabhavā /
T07dhrmsk_u:704: vedanā punar bhikṣavaḥ kinnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātīyā kiṃprabhavā /
T07dhrmsk_u:710: tatra bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam anityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:711: so 'pi sparśaḥ sāpi vedanā sāpi tṛṣṇā sāpi samanupaśyanā anityā saṃskṛtā cetitā pratītyasamutpannā / (DhskD 11v8)
T07dhrmsk_u:712: sa rūpam ātmeti samanupaśyatīti satkāyadṛṣṭiparyavasthānam utpādayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:713: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ yāvat paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ (DhskD 11v9) /
T07dhrmsk_u:714: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimam upādānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:716: na haiva rūpam ātmeti samanupaśyaty api tu rūpavantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:717: na haiva rūpavantam ātmānaṃ saṃanupaśyaty api (DhskD 11v10)
T07dhrmsk_u:719: na haiva rūpam ātmīyaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu rūpe ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:720: na haiva rūpe ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu vedanām ātmataḥ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:722: saṃanupaśyaty api tu vedanāvantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:723: na haiva vedanāvantaṃ ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu vedanām ātmīyāṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:724: na haiva vedanām ātmīyāṃ samanupaśyaty api tu vedanāyām ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:725: (DhskD 12r2) na haiva vedanāyām ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃjñām ātmataḥ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:726: na haiva saṃjñām ātmataḥ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃjñāvantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:727: na haiva saṃjñāvantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃjñām ātmīyāṃ (DhskD 12r3)
T07dhrmsk_u:729: na haiva saṃjñām ātmīyāṃ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃjñāyām ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:730: na haiva saṃjñāyām ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu saṃskārān ātmataḥ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:732: samanupaśyaty api tu saṃskāravantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati / vistaraḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:734: na haiva vijñānam ātmataḥ samanupaśyaty api tu vijñānavantam ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:736: samanupaśyati api tu vijñānam ātmīyaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:737: na haiva vijñānam ātmīyaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu vijñāne ātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:738: na haiva vijñāne ātmānaṃ samanupaśyaty api tu kāṃkṣī bhavati vicikitsī /
T07dhrmsk_u:739: na haiva kāṃkṣī bhavati vicikitsī api (DhskD 12r6)
T07dhrmsk_u:741: na haiva bhavadṛṣṭir bhavati vibhavadṛṣṭiḥ api tv astīti vācādhigataṃ bhavaty /
T07dhrmsk_u:743: yo 'sāv asmīty adhigamo 'yam aham asmīty adhigamo /
T07dhrmsk_u:746: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhavā /
T07dhrmsk_u:748: tatra bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam anityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cetitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:749: so 'pi sparśaḥ sāpi vedanā sāpi tṛṣṇā (DhskD 12r8)
T07dhrmsk_u:750: te 'pi saṃskārāḥ sāpi samanupaśyanā anityā saṃskṛtā cetitā pratītyasamutpannā asmīty adhigatā bhavaty /
T07dhrmsk_u:754: paryavasthānam utpādayati adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ tīvrāt tīvrataraṃ paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:755: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ trṣṇā paścimam upādānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:758: antagrāhadṛṣṭiparyavasthānam utpādayaty adhimātrād adhimātrataraṃ yāvat paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataram /
T07dhrmsk_u:759: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimakam upādānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:772: paraṃ maraṇād bhavati ca na bhavati ca /
T07dhrmsk_u:773: naiva bhavati na na bhavati paraṃ maraṇād /
T07dhrmsk_u:775: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād yāvat paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:776: iti pūrvakaṃ paryavasthānaṃ tṛṣṇā paścimakam (DhskD 12v3) upādānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:778: api khalu na bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno na
T07dhrmsk_u:779: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadaṃyasārathi śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāṃ
T07dhrmsk_u:782: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād vistareṇa paripūrṇāt paripūrṇataraṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:784: na svākhyāto bhagavato dharmo na sāṃdṛṣṭiko na nirjvaraḥ nākālikaḥ naupanāyiko naihipaśyakaḥ (DhskD 12v5)
T07dhrmsk_u:786: na supratipanno bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho na ṛjupratipanno na nyāyapratipanno na sāmīcīpratipanno nānudharmacārī /
T07dhrmsk_u:793: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:798: api khalu śāśvato loka idam eva satyaṃ moham anyad /
T07dhrmsk_u:804: śāśvato loko vistareṇa yāvac caiva bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇād iti idam eva satyaṃ mohaṃ anyad /
T07dhrmsk_u:806: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:810: śīlena śucyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti /
T07dhrmsk_u:812: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānaṃ utpādayati (DhskD 13r1) /
T07dhrmsk_u:815: vrataṃ parāmṛśati yad ubhayataḥ śīlavrataṃ parāmṛśati /
T07dhrmsk_u:816: śīlavratena śucyati mucyate niryāti yāvat sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikramam anuprāpnoti (DhskD 13r2) /
T07dhrmsk_u:818: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyat paryavasthānam utpādayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:821: api khalu tathāgato bhagavān arhan samyaksaṃbuddho (DhskD 13r3)
T07dhrmsk_u:823: sa tasmāt paryavasthānād anyaṃ paryavasthānam utpādayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:832: (DhskD 13r5) svākhyāto bhagavato dharmo na svākhyāto bhagavato dharmaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:840: supratipanno bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho na supratipanno bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:857: api khalu sarvāṇy eva catvāry upādānāni tṛṣṇāsamudayāni tṛṣṇājātīyāni tṛṣṇāprabhavāni /
T07dhrmsk_u:862: kāmapratisaṃyuktāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataṃ ca sthāpya yāni tadanyāni kāmapratisaṃyuktāni saṃyojanabandhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānāni idam ucyate (DhskD 13v1)
T07dhrmsk_u:866: catasro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭyupādānam ity ucyate satkāyadṛṣṭir antagrāhadṛṣṭir mithyādṛṣṭir dṛṣṭiparāmarśa itīmāś catasro dṛṣṭayo /
T07dhrmsk_u:869: yathā (DhskD 13v2) khalv ihaikatyaḥ śīlaṃ parāmṛśati vistareṇa yāvat* /
T07dhrmsk_u:870: ubhayena śīlavratena śucyati mucyate niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramam anuprāpnoti /
T07dhrmsk_u:874: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataṃ ca sthāpya tadanyāni rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāni saṃyojanabandhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānānīdam ucyate ātmavādopādānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:875: (DhskD 13v4) api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā mahānidāne vyākaraṇe āyuṣmaty ānande /
T07dhrmsk_u:877: tṛṣṇā ced ānanda nābhaviṣyad api nu kasya cit kā cit tṛṣṇābhaviṣyan /
T07dhrmsk_u:880: tṛṣṇāyām asatyām api nu upādānaṃ prajñāpayeta /
T07dhrmsk_u:882: tasmāt tarhy ānanda etan nidānam eṣa hetur eṣa samudaya eṣa pratyayaḥ upādānasya yad uta tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:883: iti (DhskD 13v6) yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktam iti //
T07dhrmsk_u:887: upādānāny eva pratītyānekavidhā bhavaprajñaptir uktā bhagavatā /
T07dhrmsk_u:888: ekavidhā asti bhavaprajñaptir yatra traidhātukāḥ paṃca skandhā uktā bhagavatā /
T07dhrmsk_u:889: (DhskD 13v7) asti bhavaprajñaptir yatrāyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvartakaṃ karmoktaṃ bhagavatā /
T07dhrmsk_u:890: asti bhavaprajñaptir yatropapattyaṃgikā paṃca skandhā uktā bhagavatā /
T07dhrmsk_u:891: katamā bhavaprajñaptir yatra traidhātukāḥ paṃca skandhā bhavā uktā (DhskD 13v8) bhagavatā /
T07dhrmsk_u:894: iyaṃ bhavaprajñaptir yatra traidhātukāḥ paṃca skandhā bhava uktā bhagavatā /
T07dhrmsk_u:895: katamā bhavaprajñaptir yatrāyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvartakaṃ karmoktaṃ bhagavatā (DhskD 13v9) /
T07dhrmsk_u:897: yad api tad ānanda karmāyatyāṃ punarbhavāya saṃvartate idam atra bhavasya /
T07dhrmsk_u:898: iyaṃ bhavaprajñaptir yatrāyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvartakaṃ karma bhava uktaṃ bhagavatā /
T07dhrmsk_u:902: vijñānaṃ phalgunāhāraṃ yāvad evāyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvartaye prādurbhāvāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:903: iyaṃ bhavaprajñaptir yatropapattyāṃgikāḥ paṃca skandhā bhava uktaṃ bhagavatā /
T07dhrmsk_u:904: api (DhskD 14r1) khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā nidānaparyāye vyākaraṇe āyuṣmaty ānande /
T07dhrmsk_u:907: sarvaśo vā punar ānanda upādāne asati api nu bhavaḥ prajñāyeta /
T07dhrmsk_u:910: caiṣa hetur eṣa samudaya eṣa pratyayo bhavasya yad utopādānaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:912: iti yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktaṃ //
T07dhrmsk_u:917: dveṣaparyavasthito mohaparyavasthitaḥ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścaritaṃ carati /
T07dhrmsk_u:918: ye te akuśalā kāyasaṃskārā vāksaṃskārā manaḥsaṃskārā ayam ucyate akuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:921: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir avakrāntir abhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ skandhapratilābho dhātupratilābha āyatanapratilābho jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāva itīyaṃ jātir (DhskD 14r5)
T07dhrmsk_u:922: imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jātir /
T07dhrmsk_u:924: yathā khalv ihaikatyo manuṣyasukhakānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:928: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ carati vācā manasā sucaritaṃ carati /
T07dhrmsk_u:929: ye te kuśalāḥ kāyasaṃskārā vāksaṃskārā manaḥsaṃskārā (DhskD 14r7)
T07dhrmsk_u:931: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān manuṣyasubhagānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:932: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir vistareṇa tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jāti /
T07dhrmsk_u:934: evaṃ cāturmahārājikānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:935: yathā khalv ihaikatyo brahmakāyikānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ tasyaivaṃ bhavaty (DhskD 14r9) /
T07dhrmsk_u:936: aho batāhaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyam iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:937: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ (DhskD 14r10)
T07dhrmsk_u:939: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvara ājīvapariśuddhir ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:940: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād (DhskD 14v1)
T07dhrmsk_u:943: iyaṃ jātir imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jātir iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:945: (DhskD 14v2) yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ parīttābhānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:947: aho batāhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyam iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:949: adhyātmasaṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T07dhrmsk_u:950: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvara ājīvapariśuddhiḥ ayam ucyate (DhskD 14v4)
T07dhrmsk_u:952: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt parīttābhanāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:953: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir vistareṇa jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāvaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:957: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ parīttaśubhānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:961: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati /
T07dhrmsk_u:962: smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate /
T07dhrmsk_u:963: yat (DhskD 14v7) tad āryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimāṃ sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T07dhrmsk_u:964: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvaraḥ ājīvapariśuddhir ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:965: (DhskD 14v8) yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt parīttaśubhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:970: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ anabhrakāṇāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:972: aho batāham anabhrakāṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyam iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:974: taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva
T07dhrmsk_u:975: ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astagamād aduḥkhāsukhaṃ upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ
T07dhrmsk_u:977: (DhskD 15r1) tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvara ājīvapariśuddhir ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:978: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād anabhrakāṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate (DhskD 15r2) /
T07dhrmsk_u:979: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātiḥ vistareṇa yāvaj jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāvaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:980: itīyaṃ jātir imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jātiḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:983: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ asaṃjñisatvānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:987: sa taṃ prārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ saṃjñām audārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikato manasikaroti āsaṃjñikaṃ ca śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:989: duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikato manasikurvataḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ ca śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataḥ saṃjnā antardhīyate āsaṃjñikaṃ ca saṃsthihati /
T07dhrmsk_u:990: iti yatra mama saṃjñā antarāyaty āsaṃjñikaṃ (DhskD 15r6)
T07dhrmsk_u:991: ca saṃsthihaty etāvad asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ samāpanna iti vaktavyaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:992: tathā samāpannasya yaḥ kāyasaṃvaro vāksaṃvaraḥ ājīvapariśuddhir ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:994: kāyasya bhedād asaṃjñisatvānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:995: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir vistareṇa yāvaj jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāva iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:996: itīyaṃ jātir imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate (DhskD 15r8)
T07dhrmsk_u:998: yathā khalv ihaikatyaḥ ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1000: aho batāhaṃ ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyam (DhskD 15r9) iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:1001: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt
T07dhrmsk_u:1002: pratighasaṃjñānām astagamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam (DhskD 15r10)
T07dhrmsk_u:1004: tathā samāpannasya yā cetanā saṃcetanābhisaṃcetanā cetayitaṃ cetanāgataṃ cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1006: tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1007: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir vistareṇa yāvaj jīvitendriyaprādurbhāva /
T07dhrmsk_u:1008: itīyaṃ jātir imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate (DhskD 15v2)
T07dhrmsk_u:1010: yathā khalv ihaikatyo vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1012: aho batāhaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyaṃ (DhskD 15v3) iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:1013: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1014: tathā samāpannasya yā cetanā yāvac cittābhisaṃskāro (DhskD 15v4)
T07dhrmsk_u:1016: yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1019: itīyaṃ jātir imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jātir iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:1020: yathā khalv ihaikatya ākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ (DhskD 15v6) /
T07dhrmsk_u:1022: aho batāham ākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyam iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:1023: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti (DhskD 15v7)
T07dhrmsk_u:1024: kiṃ cid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1025: tathā samāpannasya yā cetanā saṃcetanā vistareṇa yāvac cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma ayam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1026: (DhskD 15v8) yad api taddhetu tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedād ākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ upapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1027: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātiḥ vistareṇa yāvaj jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāva (DhskD 15v9) /
T07dhrmsk_u:1028: itīyaṃ jātir imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jātir iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:1029: yathā khalv ihaikatyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1031: aho batāhaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ upapadyeyam iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:1032: sa tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya (DhskD 16r1)
T07dhrmsk_u:1034: tathā samāpannasya yā cetanā vistareṇa yāvac cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarmāyam ucyate kuśalaḥ karmabhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1037: tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir avakrāntir abhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ skandhapratilābho dhātupratilābhaḥ āyatanapratilābhaḥ jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāvaḥ (DhskD 16r3) /
T07dhrmsk_u:1038: itīyaṃ jātir imaṃ bhavaṃ pratītya tad ucyate bhavapratyayā jātir iti /
T07dhrmsk_u:1039: api khalv evam uktam bhagavatā mahānidānaparyāye vyākaraṇe āyuṣmaty ānande /
T07dhrmsk_u:1045: iti me yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1046: bhavaś ced ānanda na syād api nu matsyānāṃ matsyatve pakṣiṇānāṃ vā pakṣitve (DhskD 16r5)
T07dhrmsk_u:1047: sarīsṛpāṇāṃ sarīsṛpatve catuṣpadānāṃ vā catuṣpadatve nāgānāṃ vā nāgatve yakṣāṇāṃ
T07dhrmsk_u:1048: vā yakṣatve bhūtānāṃ vā bhūtatve gandharvāṇāṃ vā gandharvatve devānāṃ vā devatve
T07dhrmsk_u:1050: teṣāṃ teṣām ānanda satvānāṃ tasmin tasmin satvanikāye api nu kasya cit kaś cid bhavaḥ syān /
T07dhrmsk_u:1052: sarvaśo vā punar ānanda bhave asaty api nu kasya cit kā cij jātiḥ prajñāyeta /
T07dhrmsk_u:1054: (DhskD 16r7) tasmāt tarhy ānandaitan nidānam eṣa samudaya eṣa hetur eṣa pratyayo jātyā yad uta bhavaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1056: iti me yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1061: yat teṣāṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ satvanikāye jātiḥ saṃjātir avakrāntir abhinirvṛttir vistareṇa jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāvaḥ iyam ucyate jātiḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1062: api khalv evam uktaṃ bhagavatā mahānidānaparyāye (DhskD 16r9)
T07dhrmsk_u:1067: jātiś ced ānanda na syād api nu matsyānāṃ vā matsyatve pakṣināṃ vā (DhskD 16r10)
T07dhrmsk_u:1068: pakṣitve vistareṇa yāvad devānāṃ devatve teṣāṃ teṣām ānanda satvānāṃ tasmiṃ tasmin satvanikāye api nu kasya cit kā cij jātiḥ syān /
T07dhrmsk_u:1070: sarvaśo vā punar ānanda jātyām asatyāṃ (DhskD 16v1)
T07dhrmsk_u:1073: tasmāt tarhy ānanda tan nidānaṃ eṣa samudaya eṣa hetur eṣa pratyayo jarāmaraṇasya yad uta jātiḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1074: jātipratyayam ānanda jarāmaraṇam iti me yad uktam (DhskD 16v2)
T07dhrmsk_u:1077: yat tat khālityaṃ pālityaṃ vistareṇa yāvat saṃskārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāva iyam ucyate jarā /
T07dhrmsk_u:1080: yat teṣāṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ tasmāt tasmāt satvanikāyāc (DhskD 16v3)
T07dhrmsk_u:1081: cyutiś cyavanatā bhedo 'ntarhāṇiḥ saṃmoṣaḥ parihāṇiḥ āyuṣo hānir ūṣmaṇo hāniḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepo jīvitendriyasyoparodho maraṇaṃ kālakriyā idam ucyate maraṇaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1084: yat tan mātṛmaraṇena pitṛmaraṇena bhrātṛmaraṇena bhaginīmaraṇena jñātikṣayād dhanakṣayād
T07dhrmsk_u:1085: bhogakṣayāt spṛṣṭasya śārīrikābhir vedanābhir duḥkhābis tīvrābhiḥ kharābhiḥ kaṭukābhir
T07dhrmsk_u:1087: prāṇahāriṇībhir yo dāghaḥ saṃdāghaḥ śokaḥ śocanā śokāyitatvam ayam ucyate śokaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1091: hā aṃba hā tāta hā bhagini hā bhrātaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1093: yad vākyaṃ vacanaṃ vyāhāro bhāṣā gīr niruktir vākpatho vāgghoṣo vācā vākkarma vāgvijñaptir
T07dhrmsk_u:1094: ārttir bhāṣyaṃ vipralāpo lālapyaṃ lālapyanatā paridevaḥ paridevanatā ayam ucyate
T07dhrmsk_u:1098: paṃcavijñānasaṃprayuktam asātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam idam ucyate duḥkhaṃ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1101: manovijñānaṃsaprayuktaṃ asātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam idam ucyate daurmanasyaṃ (DhskD 16v8) /
T07dhrmsk_u:1104: yaś cetasa āyāsa upāyāsaḥ upāyāsanatā ayam ucyate upāyāsaḥ //
T07dhrmsk_u:1106: api khalv avidyāduḥkhaskandhaṃ pratītya saṃskāraduḥkhaskandhasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati (DhskD 16v9)
T07dhrmsk_u:1123: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavāṃś chrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
T07dhrmsk_u:1126: paṃca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇi aśāntāni bhavanti sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme vijñānāṃ garhyo
T07dhrmsk_u:1127: bhavati paścāc cānutāpyaḥ kāyasya ca bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgatiṃ vinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1130: yat prāṇātipātikaḥ prāṇātipātapratyayaṃ vadyaṃ vairaṃ prasavati prāṇātipātād aprativiratasya evam asyedaṃ prathamaṃ bhayaṃ vadyaṃ vairam aśāntaṃ bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1132: surāmaireyamadyapramādasthāyikaḥ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānabhayaṃ vadyaṃ vairaṃ prasavati surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānād aprativiratasya (DhskD 17r7)
T07dhrmsk_u:1133: evam asyedaṃ paṃcamaṃ bhayaṃ vadyaṃ vairam aśāntaṃ bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1134: yasya kasya cid imāni paṃca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇy aśāntāni bhavanti sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme vijñānāṃ garhyo bhavati paścāc cānutāpyaḥ /
T07dhrmsk_u:1135: (DhskD 17r8) kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgatiṃ vinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1136: yasya tu kasya cit paṃca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇi śāntāni bhavanti sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme vijñānāṃ praśasyo bhavati paścāc ca nānutāpyaḥ (DhskD
T07dhrmsk_u:1137: kāyasya ca bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1138: katamāni paṃca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇi śāntāni bhavanti /
T07dhrmsk_u:1139: yat* prāṇātipātikaḥ prāṇātipātapratyayaṃ bhayaṃ vadyaṃ vairaṃ prasavati prāṇātipātāt (DhskD 17r10)
T07dhrmsk_u:1140: prativiratasya evam asyedaṃ prathamaṃ vadyaṃ vairaṃ śāntaṃ bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1143: bhayaṃ vadyaṃ vairaṃ prasavati surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratasya evam asyedaṃ paṃcamaṃ bhayaṃ vadyaṃ vairaṃ śāntaṃ bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1144: yasya kasya cid imāni paṃca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇi śāntāni bhavanti sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme (DhskD 17v2)
T07dhrmsk_u:1145: vijñānāṃ praśasyo bhavati paścāc ca nānutāpyaḥ kāyasya ca bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1147: idam uktvā sugato hy athāparam etad uvāca śāstā //
T07dhrmsk_u:1148: yaḥ prāṇam atipātayati mṛṣāvādaṃ (DhskD 17v3) ca bhāṣate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1149: loke adattam ādatte paradāraṃ ca gacchati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1150: surāmaireyapānaṃ ca yo naro hy adhigṛdhyati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1151: saktaḥ paṃcasu dharmeṣu duḥśīla iti kathyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1155: loke adattaṃ nādatte paradāraṃ na gacchati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1157: muktaḥ paṃcasu dharmeṣu śīlavān iti kathyate /
T07dhrmsk_u:1162: yataś ca gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati cittam utpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate upāsakaṃ (DhskD 17v6)
T07dhrmsk_u:1166: yataś copāsakaḥ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati prāṇātipātāt (DhskD 17v7)
T07dhrmsk_u:1167: prativirataḥ adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādād aprativirataḥ iyatā upāsakaḥ śikṣāsv ekadeśakārī bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1170: yataś copāsakaḥ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati
T07dhrmsk_u:1171: prāṇātipātād adattādānāt prativirataḥ kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānād (DhskD 17v9)
T07dhrmsk_u:1172: aprativirataḥ iyatā upāsakaḥ śikṣāsu pradeśakārī bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1174: yataś copāsakaḥ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ (DhskD 17v10)
T07dhrmsk_u:1175: gato bhavati prāṇātipātād adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt prativirataḥ mṛṣāvādāt surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānād aprativirataḥ iyatā upāsakaḥ śikṣāsu yadbhūyaskāri bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1177: yataś copāsakaḥ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati
T07dhrmsk_u:1178: prāṇātipātād adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt prativirataḥ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānād (DhskD 18r2)
T07dhrmsk_u:1179: aprativirataḥ iyatā upāsakaḥ śikṣāsv aparipūrṇakārī bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1181: yataś copāsakaḥ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato bhavati prāṇātipātāt (DhskD 18r3)
T07dhrmsk_u:1182: prativirataḥ adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativirataḥ iyatā upāsakaḥ śikṣāsu paripūrṇakārī bhavati
T07dhrmsk_u:1192: dharmaiḥ samanvāgata upāsaka ātmahitāya pratipanno bhavati parahitāya //
T07dhrmsk_u:1193: daśabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgata upāsakaḥ ātmahitāya pratipanno bhavati parahitāya ca /
T07dhrmsk_u:1196: ātmanā adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativirato bhavati parāṃś ca surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaviratau (DhskD 18r8)
T07dhrmsk_u:1198: ebhir daśabhir dharmais samanvāgataḥ upāsakaḥ ātmahitāya pratipanno bhavati parahitāya ca //
T07dhrmsk_u:1199: paṃcadaśabhir dharmais samanvāgata upāsakaḥ atmāhitāya pratipanno bhavati parahitāya ca (DhskD 18r9)
T07dhrmsk_u:1201: ātmanā prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati parān api prāṇātipātaviratau samādāpayati prāṇātipātavirataṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sumanojño bhavati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1203: adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaviratau samādāpayati surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānavirataṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sumanojño bhavaty /
T07dhrmsk_u:1205: samanvāgataḥ upāsakaḥ ātmahitāya pratipanno bhavati parahitāya bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya ca //
T07dhrmsk_u:1206: aṣṭābhir dharmais samanvāgata upāsakaḥ ātmahitāya pratipanno bhavati na parahitāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:1208: śraddhāsaṃpanno bhavati no tu parāṃ cchraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati /
T07dhrmsk_u:1210: abhīkṣṇam ārāmaṃ gantā bhavati bhikṣūṇāṃ darśanāya /
T07dhrmsk_u:1214: ātmanā upaparīkṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñāya dharmam ājñāya dharmānudharmapratipanno
T07dhrmsk_u:1215: bhavati sāmīcīpratipanno 'nudharma no tu parān dharmacārī no tu parān dharmānudharmapratipattau (DhskD 18v4)
